sentence: The complimentary evening wine reception morning coffee and choice of newspapers were much appreciated too
The hotel itself is very clean the hallways smell like cleaning products which is a good sign
Free wine and snacks in the lobby from 5 6pm also a nice touch
It was my sons graduation weekend from Johns Hopkins and it was so convenient to Georgetown where he lives and to the Graduation at DAR Convention Hall
Complimentary morning coffee in the lobby that was an A PlusThe location of the hotel is great for tourists so close to many attractions such as White house National Mall Lincoln Memorial etc
Wine happy hourOnly 1 elevator was working
Loved the small quaint reception area adjacent to the front desk
You do get free tea coffee in the lobby in the morning free wine 5 6 in the evening all in all it is great fab hotel would stay again
The hotel offered great service a free coffee service in the lobby most of the morning and a free wine house 530pm til 630pm I think
gave you a warm welcome in the morning and left the room spotless and Sarah in reception was particularly helpful with maps directions and recommendations
When I tried to ask a few questions regarding the accommodations etc
Hallways littered with food trays
However only 1 working elevator so be ready to take an excruciatingly LONG TIME to get to your room

They are upgrading elevators Nov 2018 but have really clever ways of acknowledging the disruption like riddles in elevator lobbies and IHG points for getting a certain of steps a day to encourage usage if stairs
One elevator was out of service leaving only one elevator running for the entire building
Not only do they charge a fee on top of your rate the internet will go down the elevators wo n’t work and it ’s like you live in a spacious yet faulty apartment
Hidden Fees for Amenities
They advertise free wifi and a gym which is the saddest gym i ve ever seen
When I first arrived I was surprised how small the hotel lobby is with no real restaurant or bar contrary to advertising
The Lobby needs TLC
